dcterms:description: A dataset of drum samples built from various sample packs, including Vengeance sample packs, containing over 40,000 samples across 11 drum categories. The final dataset contains 11 balanced categories (kicks, claps, snares, open and closed hi-hats, tambourines, congas, bongos, shakers, snaps, and toms) with 3000 sounds each for a total of 33000 sounds. All sounds are WAV audio files PCM-coded in 16 bits and sampled at 22050 Hz, with lengths between 0.1 and 1 second.
dcterms:title: Drum Samples Dataset
